tool_description: Climate  change new from all over the world
name: Monet Climate Change News
title: Monet Climate Change News

api_list.name: Show a specific news
api_list.description: Show a climate change news from specific newspaper
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://monet-climate-change-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/guardian"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "monet-climate-change-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

        }

print(response.json())
